climbers.name: Andrew Irvine
climbers.causeOfDeath: Disappeared; body never found; cause of death unknown

climbers.name: George Mallory
climbers.causeOfDeath: Disappeared; body found in 1999; evidence suggests Mallory died from being accidentally struck by his ice axe following a fall.

climbers.name: Maurice Wilson
climbers.causeOfDeath: Body found 1935; cause of death possibly exhaustion, exposure or starvation.

climbers.name: Harsh Vardhan
climbers.causeOfDeath: Succumbed after falling and being suspended above a crevice during a blizzard

climbers.name: Mike Rheinberger
climbers.causeOfDeath: 150m fall. He showed signs of Exhaustion, Dehydration, Cerebral Oedema, Retinal Hemorrages and possible blood clots in his upper legs.

climbers.name: Scott Fischer
climbers.causeOfDeath: Suspected high-altitude cerebral edema, exhaustion, frostbite and exposure.

climbers.name: Ngawang Topche
climbers.causeOfDeath: Lapsed into Coma on 23 Apr 1996; later died in hospital

climbers.name: Aleksei Nikiforov
climbers.causeOfDeath: Pre-existing illness exacerbated by freezing conditions, altitude

climbers.name: Zoran Miletic
climbers.causeOfDeath: Exact cause and date of death unknown

climbers.name: Robert William Milne
climbers.causeOfDeath: Organ failure due to freezing conditions

climbers.name: Ralf D. Arnold
climbers.causeOfDeath: Exhaustion and related complications after breaking leg at Second Step
